Element.name: BPMResources
Element.Description: The BPM resources defines the BPMN resources referenced by the Web Project. The list of referenced resources are updated during the BPM to Web Project synchronization.

SubElement.name: BPMResource
SubElement.Description: A BPM Resource represents a BPM diagram file referenced by this Web Project.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The universal unique identifier of the BPM resource.
The workspace relative path of the BPM resource.
